text: "Underdogs" is a 2007 song by Welsh rock band Manic Street Preachers. It is the first single from their eighth studio album Send Away the Tigers. The outro is likened to Alice Cooper, The Stooges and Iggy Pop. It was only available as a digital download. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Punk rock songs Category:Manic Street Preachers songs
title: Underdogs (song)
